title: Did Bayden's campaign spread after the "power of the bar owner" as a conscious investor?
subtitle: A spokesman for Trump claimed that the Paiden campaign had withdrawn an announcement depicting the Michigan businessman Joe Malcolm because the campaign "captured" in a lie.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In October 2020, Joe Biden's presidential campaign pulled an announcement depicting Joe Malcolm because the campaign "His captured" faked his business interests and his family's inherited wealth.
